event: The Great Chase - FatHopes Energy Team Building 2025
description: As a team, we have to overcome challenges and mysteries while racing against other teams from Shah Alam to Port Dickson.
As a team, we built an amphibian robot that can runs on both land and water, while avoiding obstacles.
Jeopardy format CTF hackathon. Using our wit to solve cryptography, reverse engineering, web exploitation, forensics, and binary exploitation challenges.

event: Dew Challenge 2012: The Xtreme Ride, by Mountain Dew
description: Climbing up mountains, down onto the water, one-person phyical challenges around Kuala Lumpur in a single day.
Despite we are still in our highshool, we won the quiz challenge held by Universiti Tun Hussein Onn Malaysia as a team.
